fields.description:
I have several bullet list items. I'm on the last one. I want to backspace from the start of the last list item so that I get rid of the last item as a separate list item and combine it with one of the previous list items.

Steps to reproduce:

# Create text in a bulleted list. Have the second last list item empty
# Click to position the cursor at the beginning of the the last list item
# Press backspace. Pressing it 3 times should achieve the desired outcome
# After pressing backspace twice, the cursor is incorrectly positioned at the end of the last list item, meaning that when I backspace, I inadvertently delete the wrong content.


See attached video for demo.


Bonus bug: because I deleted the wrong content, I use cmd+z for undo. After pressing cmd+z twice (I think) the cursor is moved to the start of the comment and redo becomes unavailable.
fields.summary: Pressing backspace to delete a bullet point with no text incorrectly moves the cursor to the end of the line

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31618].
  {panel}

Steps:
1. Create jira chart (status report)
2. Go to edit the page again
3. Sometimes when I click on a chart (priority for example) the buttons: 'Edit' and 'Remove' are not displayed

Expected: It should display the 'Edit' and 'Remove' buttons after clicking on a specific report.

Note: this might happen mostly in IE10
fields.summary: 'Edit' and 'remove' links are not displayed after clicking on a macro in IE10

fields.description:
Repro: 
1. Create a table
2. Type some text into a cell
3. Bring cursor to beginning of text and click indent button --> nothing happens.  Bring cursor to end of text and click indent button --> nothing happens.

Workaround: 
1. Turn the text in a cell into a bullet
2. Unbullet the text
3. Click the indent button --> text gets indented (!)
fields.summary: Indent button doesnt indent text when text is in a table

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31616].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:
* Create a file list page
* Make 3 identical copies of a file, and give the files different names like: 'image1.jpg', 'image2.jpg', 'image3.jpg'
* Use the 'browse for files' link to upload each of the identical files

Expected: Each of the files should upload successfully
Actual: Some files do not trigger an upload and there is no error. After selecting the file the spinner does not appear and no file is uploaded.

There is no identifiable pattern which of the 3 will fail to upload, but it is consistent that always one of them will.

Retested on chrome/firefox where the issue does not appear.
fields.summary: IE11 - Some files uploaded to File List Page fails to upload without error.
IE11 - typing without clicking in editor window first creates issues

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31613].
  {panel}

Instead of being inserted where the cursor currently is, content is put at the top of the page.

Reproduced for:
* Tables
* Images
* Emoticons
* Status

If you do things inline (e.g. put a status macro in with autocomplete rather than from the insert menu, it works.)
fields.summary: IE11 - Inserting content always puts it at the top of the Editor

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31612].
  {panel}

* Example page: https://mark06conf.jira-dev.com/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=327683
* Note that this is simply the page in the demo space called "Prettify the page with an image (step 4 of 9)"
* Edit the page

Expected: single scroll bar
Actual: Double scroll bar - note that you can scroll past the footer
fields.summary: IE11 - pages with images and layouts can have a double scroll bar

fields.description:
IE 11

Created a new blog post.
Added lots of text to it.

Tried to use find/replace to change the word "out" to "monkey". But nothing happened, neither clicking "next" or "replace all"
fields.summary: IE11 - Find replace does not work in the editor

fields.description:
IE 11

Create a Blank Page
Write a line of text
Try to put a period dot "." after the line
It is not possible to put the dot on the last line
Expected, it should be possible to put dot there.

Note that the sentence needs to be on the last line for this error to occur.

*Workaround*
- Copy and paste the 'dot' / full stop from somewhere else
- Go back one character to the left before the last line and add the 'dot'
fields.summary: IE11 - Can not put a period dot after the last sentence

fields.description:
h3. WHAT's WRONG:

I am getting a blank white modal window when I click on "New Notifications"...

- The box displays that I have 5 new notifications but I can't get to them. 
- If I type 'g' then 'n' it brings up my browser Quick Search
- I am using Firefox on a Mac
- There is no other place to retrieve my New Notifications: not in my Profile, Personal Space, etc., etc....

I have 2 screenshots that include the computer clock so you can see a time-stamp of click sequence.

h3. WHAT IS NEEDED:

- Either:
# Tell me how to get to my New Notification's , OR
# Fix the issue
fields.summary: New Notifications Displays a Blank White Screen

fields.description:
h4.Steps to Reproduce: # Create a page # Insert HTML macro on the page # Use the following pattern inside the HTML macro (Let's use *test* as duplicate attribute here): {panel} {panel} # Insert Table of Contents macro on the page # Save Or you can use: {code}

Test

]]> {code} h4.Actual Results: The error below: {code} Error rendering macro 'toc' : [com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxLazyException] com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxParsingException: Duplicate attribute 'test'. at [row,col {unknown-source}]: [1,481] {code} h4. Findings: Upon removing the duplication attribute TOC works fine on the page.
fields.summary: TOC macro cannot render duplicate attributes
LDAP and Active Directory credentials are stored in plain text in database
Remove required password fields on 'add user' screen when adding a user to a delegated directory

fields.description: I create documents much of the time by putting in a list of steps and dragging the image into its spot after taking a screen shot. I am using safari on maverick and Skitch to take the screenshots in PNG. After 4 or 5 images, the first images I dragged in get overwritten by the last image.
fields.summary: Images are replaced when using HTML5 drag into document

fields.description:
When inserting a PDF macro, from the Insert 'PDF' Macro screen, I click "Refresh" to get a preview, and it stalls.

If I click Insert anyway, and save the page, it converts fine.  I then click edit, edit the PDF, and am taken back to the same screen, and the PDF loads right away.

It has been fixed as of 5.3.1.

fields.description:
Steps 

1. insert JIRA Issue macro
2. create a new Story using the macro
3. set version to whatever you have in JIRA on the selected project
4. open the JIRA issue you just created using JIRA

- The version you just set is set to affected version not fix version.
- Creating Storys and selecting a version it dosent make sense in setting the default as Affected version. Doing the same creating a Bug makes sense...
fields.summary: When creating JIRA issues using "JIRA Isssues macro" macro defaults Version to Affected Version

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31595].
  {panel}

If you check the *Templates* configuration in either the Space level or in the Global Templates configuration the *What are Blueprints?* link is pointing to Confluence's standalone specific documentation. That documentation mentions adding new blueprints amongst other functions that are not available in OnDemand, that can cause friction with customers.

The current link is:
http://docs.atlassian.com/confluence/docs-53/Working+with+Blueprints

The correct link should be:
https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/AOD/Working+with+Blueprints
fields.summary: The "What are Blueprints?" links in Confluence within 'Templates' configuration is directing customers to the Standalone docs
Advanced code block configuration

With Chrome Version 30.0.1599.101 m

When I edit any Macro, the edit mask is not showing correctly, but the various columns are messed up. I cannot react for all the fields or save the edits.
See the screnshot.
It works fine with other browsers,only Chrome creates an issue.
How can I figure out what is creating a problem on Chrome and fix this?
fields.summary: Using Chrome the Edit Macro Mask is all over the place

OnDemand site imports broken when importing from a version >= Confluence 5.2
Add support for absolute Image placeholder URLs

fields.description:
Exporting a space has a "exportAll" parameter {{String exportSpace(String token, String spaceKey, String exportType, boolean exportAll)}}
However, there is no equivalent exportAll parameter on the PDF export API - https://developer.atlassian.com/display/CONFDEV/Remote+API+Specification+for+PDF+Export

This may result in a different behaviour to exporting the space to PDF via UI - need verification
^ UI and Soap both hit the same service in backend. There is no concept of an "exportAll" parameter - the entire space is always exported to PDF
fields.summary: Missing exportAll parameter on the PDF export API

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31583].
  {panel}

Please release 2.6.10 of the table of contents macro for Confluence OnDemand. This fixes a critical bug where the entries in the Numbered Headings connect add-on are not rendered properly:

!https://www.monosnap.com/image/k6ZbFuPNgQawVFN0phmAeqDPY.png|width=50%,height=50%!

----

I have verified and tested that building 2.6.10-SNAPSHOT of TOC fixes the issue with numbered headings in on-demand.

!https://www.monosnap.com/image/x9pENTd19T2BN1OsYDdzJ2Wxc.png|width=50%,height=50%!

----

List of changes in TOC:
https://bitbucket.org/atlassian/confluence-toc-plugin/compare/master..toc-plugin-2.6.9#commits
fields.summary: Release and upgrade Confluence TOC macro in OD
Fix the table header formatting when using the page properties with a table which has header rows (not columns)
Attachment name display too short
Default Card does not behave as expected
Add a page title to allow "duplicate" site names in the page navitgation

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31574].
  {panel}

Customer pointed out that:
{quote}
In https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Confluence+5.3+Upgrade+Notes Atlassian writes
{noformat}
Some translations not available in 5.3
Translations for several new features, including the new Create Space dialog, new blueprints, Whitelist and the Livesearch macro, are not available in this release. We *hope* to make these translations available shortly after this release in 5.3.1.  If you use a language pack other than English, we do not recommend you upgrade to Confluence 5.3 yet. 
{noformat}

Unfortunately i can't find more information on this. Is this translation issue fixed with 5.3.1?
{quote}

I've checked in 5.3.1 that all of the above were not fully translated to other language than English. We've got the news that there were few missing translations for the business blueprints in 5.3.x and the updated translation will be ready in the coming Confluence 5.4 instead.

Can we get the followings fully translated too in 5.4:
- Create Space dialog:
!create space.jpg!
- Whitelist:
!whitelist.jpg!
- Livesearch macro:
!livesearch.jpg!

Also, can we get the documentation/release notes of 5.4 to clearly indicate about the translation update if they will be implemented in this release.
fields.summary: Update users about translations in the coming 5.4 release notes
Ability to Bulk Import Office Documents
Ldap users are not added in confluence-users member
Blueprint Builder

fields.description: In a Space where I have created a File List containing images, the first image selected with the 'Show more info' arrow shows an embedded web page of the images' version history and renders the 'Properties' and 'Remove' unclickable. If there is more than one image on the page and a second or more image is selected the  'Show more info' arrow behaves as expected with the 'Properties' and 'Remove' click-able.
fields.summary: File List of Images shows Version history of the first image selected

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31566].
  {panel}

This Issue is connected with https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-30725. In our lozenge and clickable macros we have defined link parameter with type "confluence-content". 
In previous versions of Confluence it was possible to put into this parameter both: 
- link to another Page in Confluence instance  
- URL (for example: http://www.adaptavist.com).  
In Confluence 5.3+ when we put URL as a input - The macro fails to render and displays a red warning icon with the following tooltip:  
{code}Unhandled element type '{http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml}a'{code} 
To reproduce issue I created very simple macro that show confluence behaviour of Confluence for parameter with type "confluence-content". (See the attachment)

There is workaround - to change parameter confluence-content type into string type, however we expect that version Confluence 5.3 should let us use the same type as we were using in previous versions.
fields.summary: Link macro parameter with type confluence-content problem
The Table Plugin is rendering error message despite valid license

fields.description:

Attached is the link to the main side and all subside does not work either
https://wcdma-confluence.rnd.ki.sw.ericsson.se/display/RM/W14A+Release+Project
fields.summary: Automatic Notification does not work

fields.description:
Whenever copying code into the Code macro, it seems to strip away all line breaks and indentations. Copy/paste works fine in Chrome, but not in IE 9.

The original issue CONF-23564 was reported fixed, but the issue still appears in IE 9 with the latest Confluence Version 5.2.4
fields.summary: Code macro does not maintain line breaks or code indentations in IE9

fields.description:
Hi,

After our upgrade to Confluence 5.2.3 and Team Calendars 4 plugin we encountered a few issues.

1) There is an additional field called EVENT that cannot be editable. Some users were trying to use this to add additional options under the drop down. From what I found out by looking through the system(s) that isn't possible.

2) An additional field (WHAT) was added, and appears to be a required field. This wasn't available in the previous version, so how (if possible) can we disable that particular field? We currently don't use that field, and in some cases it looks like the calendars we have in place duplicate the fields.

3) One user in our instance was getting notified about a calendar that got updated. From what I can see this calendar that user isn't part of, so I can't explain why the user is getting notified for that calendar. The user getting the notification isn't part of that calendar.
fields.summary: Team Calendars Plugin - Version 4

fields.description:
Similar to JRA-35647, this is one to track Confluence error. We upgraded from Confluence 4.3.3 to 5.2.3 and this issue now exists in our production instance.

If we can find the commonality of what is causing this we can probably resolve both issues, this one and the JRA-35647.
fields.summary: Menus fail to stick on pull downs.
Screenshot.jpg duplication

(see video attached)

fields.description:
h4. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a new page
# Create a bullet/numbered list
# In a new line below the list, create a table with some rows. Like this:
|| ||
| test1 |
| test2 |
| test3 |
# Save the page (so that the undo/redo history in the editor is cleared)
# Edit the page again
# Using IE 9 or 10, try to remove/cut row "test1"

h4. Results
* It's not possible to click anywhere in the editor (the content part)
* The history is empty (unable to undo)

h4. Environment Information
Tested on IE 9 and 10 

h4. Workaround
Click "Cancel" button to cancel all edits
fields.summary: Editor freezes after removing/cutting a table row in a page with lists in IE 9 or 10

fields.description:
Confluence 5.1. Sorry am not sure if it's 5.1.5 or earlier, we just migrated.

1. Insert Table Plus macro
2. Insert table within macro
3. Insert table within table, or as a second table within macro
4. Edit Table Plus macro settings so that "Multiple Table Processing" is turned off, change border setting to something obvious like 5px, or apply a custom class.

Expectation: The nested table and second table retain default settings. The first table has the border and class.

What's happening: All tables inherit the class and border setting of the Table Plus macro. Same goes for the second separate table. I did not test other settings.
fields.summary: Table Plus - Disabling Multiple Table Processing option not respected

fields.description:
This error affects Confluence 5.3.1

Today I moved a page with around 50 child pages and *very much links* with circular references between the pages to another space.

After around 15 Seconds of waiting an error occured and has been displayed in the move dialog. Unfortunately I forgot the error message.

The result was that the page and all subpages were moved, but around 70% of the links (about 500 links!) were broken! I had to delete all these links manually and add them again.

I checked the catalina.out log but found nothing related to this error.

The priority "Critical" is suitable because of the resulting severe data corruption and inconsistency.

I assume the problem is only with so very much links. I often moved pages with Confluence with no error, but never a page with so much child pages and much links.
fields.summary: Error moving a page with many subpages and links

fields.description: {panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31545]. {panel} User Timesheet gadget: Icon of a Test Case issue is missing. The related tag has an attribute src: https://tandbergdata.atlassian.nethttp//confluence.atlassian.com/download/attachments/160463/test1.gif?version=1&modificationDate=1139315206152 but should be: https://confluence.atlassian.com/download/attachments/160463/test1.gif?version=1&modificationDate=1139315206152

Widget Connector Bug

fields.description:
If you create a page  using headings and a toc-macro it works all fine on a Mac using Safari – using Firefox a click on a link in the toc does not end up in a jump to the corresponding part of the text - stays as is.

Having this problem on a confluence 5.1.4 and 5.2.3 but "Affected Versions" says that there is no 5.2.3 existing ?
fields.summary: TOC macro does not resolve the anchor to a heading on Mac using Firefox
Problem with Cut/Copy paste into the  merge cell

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31536].
  {panel}

It's possible to have pages of sufficient length that generating a PDF from them takes longer than 60 seconds and so runs into the Nginx timeout period in OnDemand. This makes it basically impossible to successfully generate a PDF that the customer can access. Confluence should generate PDFs with a long-running task view so we avoid this.

*Workaround*
There are two options that you can take as a workaround.  

The first option is to split one long confluence document into several smaller documents. 

Alternatively, you can use the [Confluence Space / Multiple page export tool|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF53/Exporting+Confluence+Pages+and+Spaces+to+PDF] to export the page without it timing out. Please note, you'll need to have the Export Space permission to be able to do this.
fields.summary: PDF Single-page exports should be run in the background with a "Long running task" view to avoid timing out in OnDemand

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31535].
  {panel}

Try editing a Lucidchart diagram using IE11.

The UI never loads - see screenshot.

I'm not sure whether it is a Lucidchart problem, or with Connect itself.

Viewing an existing diagram works fine.
fields.summary: IE11 - Lucidchart UI does not load
When Epic Link is chosen as a display field in the JIRA macro, it should show Epic Name.
Minimise the sidebar by default when viewing on a mobile device

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31532].
  {panel}

All of our development projects are a combination of a Confluence Space, a JIRA Project and a Stash Project. We want to have a uniform key pattern across all products, but right now every single product key pattern is slightly different.

Can all product converge toward the JIRA pattern? ([A-Z][A-Z_0-9]+)

- *Confluence:* underscores are not supported.
- *Stash:* underscores are not supported, lowercase is not supported.
- *JIRA:* lowercase characters are not supported. 

Right now we are limited to the lowest common denominator between all apps.
fields.summary: consistent key patterns across atlassian products

fields.description:
When content is separated by a soft return, Lucene doesn't see a soft return as whitespace or word boundary and gets rid of the soft return character.  Impact:

This is line 106[soft return]
Next line

Gets parsed and indexed as 106Next

So searching for 106 returns nothing but searching for 106Next returns accurate results.  However, obviously this isn't accurate.

Rated as Major because makes index entries flawed
fields.summary: Inaccurate Lucene whitespace tokenization of soft returns
Correct minor typo on Confluence Gadgets page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31528].
  {panel}

Space XML imports will sometimes fail due to a variety of reasons:
* Confluence runs out of memory
* The import process times out
* Unique key constraint violations
* A few other causes are described in https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Troubleshooting+XML+backups+that+fail+on+restore

Oftentimes these partially imported spaces remain in the DB without any way to remove them via the UI, making a re-import attempt impossible (due to a duplicate Space Key or other constraint violation).

Can we investigate:
- some way to rollback a failed XML space import (or determine whether imports will fail before it starts)?
- possibilities for Confluence to automatically recognise half-imported Spaces and delete related data from the UI?

*Current workaround:* [How to Manually Delete a Space|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/After+a+failed+space+import%2C+it%27s+not+possible+to+re-import+because+of+leftover+space+data] (Cloud users will need to contact Atlassian Support and request removing the Space from Confluence database)
fields.summary: When Space XML Imports Fail, Partial Space Data is Left in the Database

fields.description:
When attempting to upload a new version of an attachment (regardless of file size or file type) using either the Image macro > "Upload Image" or the drag and drop functionality, the following error message appears: 

Could not upload the file to Confluence. The server may be unavailable.

This error message does not occur when uploading the original attachment. 

Attachments can only be uploaded by either removing the original attachment or navigating to Tools > Attachment and then selecting "Lock to Edit."
fields.summary: New versions of attachments cannot be added when editing the page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31525].
  {panel}

When a page has a "Children display" macro with the option "include excerpt" checked, it gives a performance issue. When opening that page it will take about 30 seconds to load the page and the cpu will take a high load for that time. 

When unchecking the "include excerpt" option the page will load normally.

Cheers,
Herman Wander
fields.summary: Children display macro with include excerpt gives performance issue
Embedding an attachment via the ! shortcut causes a storage format error
Auto macro fill not working. Help not coming for macros.

fields.description:
We have a plugin in which we're creating a SOAP client using Axis. There were no problems in previous versions of Confluence but a client of ours upgraded to 5.3 recently. When Confluence is started with the plugin installed the Confluence Remote API breaks. The plugin itself works when installed and after Confluence restart.

The plugin has {{org.apache.axis}} package marked as private in the {{maven-confluence-plugin}} instructions in {{pom.xml}}.

This is what is output in {{atlassian-confluence.log}} when accessing {{/rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2?wsdl}}
{code}
2013-11-07 11:58:29,650 WARN [http-8090-2] [confluence.rpc.axis.AxisSoapServer] init Initialising AXIS SOAP service (servlet initialised)
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2 | userName: admin
2013-11-07 11:58:29,677 WARN [http-8090-2] [confluence.rpc.axis.AxisSoapServer] recycleAxisServlet Initialising AXIS SOAP service (loading)
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2 | userName: admin
2013-11-07 11:58:29,743 WARN [http-8090-2] [apache.axis.configuration.EngineConfigurationFactoryFinder] newFactory Factory org.apache.axis.configuration.EngineConfigurationFactoryServlet Ignored: missing required method: public static EngineConfigurationFactory newFactory(Object).
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2 | userName: admin
2013-11-07 11:58:29,854 WARN [http-8090-2] [confluence.rpc.axis.ConfluenceAxisServerFactory] getServer getServer
 -- url: /rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2 | userName: admin
{code}
The browser output from {{/rpc/soap-axis/confluenceservice-v2?wsdl}} can be seen in the attachment
fields.summary: Including axis in a plugin breaks remote API

fields.description:
h4.Synopsis When using the content report Macro, and showing specific columns may fail to show the contents of the named column, even if the name of the column is correct. h4.Environment * Issue occurs in Chrome, IE, Firefox on Windows 7 and 8 - doesn't appear to be browser specific * Macro version is the latest version h4.Steps to Reproduce: # Create the following page in Confluence; and give it a label of "Policies" {code}
Policy number something
Policy application Organisation
Policy category Finance
Authorisation Chief Financial Officer
{code} # On a seperate page within the same space, add the following content: {code}

Policies

policy

fields.description:
At least in a Chrome 26-30.  Sometimes.

This seems to reproduce it fairly reliably.

* Grab a few paragraphs of lorem ipsum.  (you can preview the built-in lorem ipsum macro)
* copy and paste it say 12 times?
* cut one of the earlier paragraphs
* paste it.
* be annoyed when the editor scrolls myseriously to the end, or near the end.

I _think_ this is probably a Confluence 4.0 issue we just haven't been able to reproduce reliably enough to fix.  There are a few earlier issues closed as cannot reproduce.
fields.summary: Cutting and pasting in long comments makes editor scroll inappropriately

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31509].
  {panel}

The graph displayed by the global usage tracking pluging (or the Space Activity Screen) will count every page hit, so If a same user access the same page in a day, that will reflect in the graph, hence the page hits are not unique.

We got a ticket about this and I also was able to see multiple people asking the same question :):
https://support.atlassian.com/browse/CSP-112732

Page used by the customer on the above ticket:
https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Viewing+Space+Activity

Since this still behaves like this in our latest version, we need to update that note on all the supported version page (from 4.3 to latest).
fields.summary: We need add a note to Viewing Space Activity page informing that the page hits counted are not unique.

fields.description:
I am using {{#logoBlock("~$user.name")}} as part of a macro that generates a company directory based on user group association. What's interesting is that a user has recently uploaded a new image to their user profile but when I use #logoBlock, the image shown is different to the one in their profile.

I assumed that this was some sort of caching issue, whether on the server or in the user's browser but despite clearing all Confluence caches, browser caches, and even restarting the Confluence instance it still remains.

EDIT: After discussing this further with the user I can also report that the profile image shown in the top right corner also does not update, so this is not necessarily linked to #logoBlock.
fields.summary: User's avatar generated By #logoBlock not the same as their profile picture

fields.description:
We upgraded our Confluence instance to 5.2.3 and been encountering some reports users are not able to attach images to their documents. In some cases what happens when the option is chosen to put an image on a page the dialog box appears but the cursor just spins. In some cases the screen will appear and then show an error because now two images will appear with the same name.

I am not sure if this is due to a browser version; users use Chrome, Safari and Firefox on Mac and different behavior occurs.

On that same topic - the TOOLBAR on the EDIT screen differs between browsers. If you need a screen shot I can include one.
fields.summary: Image attachments issues

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31506].
  {panel}

The ability to embed wiki content from a page into other pages and have either the "original source" or the embedded section editable but kept in sync.

Use: For example, if there is a common piece of information shared across multiple pages currently the easiest way to manage this is to create a link in each page pointing to a separate dedicated page. 

However this can often spoil the instant nature and convenience of the original page especially if the information is just a paragraph or screenshot or small set of instructions and having leaping to a new page disconnects or confuses the user.

This wiki disconnect becomes particularly problematic when exporting a page as a pdf/doc (e.g work instructions) where basic wiki links to content on other pages become invalid or even just when rendering the page contents where a page heading is just a link to another page.

This would work well by being able to embed a page section into another page for example a section defined using the page layout section option (numeric value or header value) or a section just defined by the header value.
fields.summary: Embedded Wiki Content
User or Group Page Security

fields.description:
When using Confluence it likes to make correct English strings instead of simple labels or identifiers. For example, in the activity feed I see this:

Sam Rees’s Home created Oct 25, 2013

This is incorrect, as last names are considered plural nouns and for plural nouns ending in 's' possession should be indicated with a single apostrophe after the s.

Reference: http://dictionary.reference.com/writing/styleguide/punctuation.html#possessives
fields.summary: Possesive is not displayed correctly.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31502].
  {panel}

Hi I feel the Page Layout & Section feature is a game changer in making quick, attractive and easy to read content on Confluence.

I would like to suggest some additions to make it go even further!

1) Allow sub-dividing and resizing of individual Sections with drag-able border rather than having to rely on hitting enter for vertical sizing, especially useful for resizing the horizontal.

2) Allow part or full borders to be drawn around each individual section and fill options, with options to select which sides to render a line, margin size (so to avoid a grid look), corner style, section fill colour and line style. 

Currently you have to insert a standard panel inside a section however a normal panel will only automatically fit the size of the text and not the section so you end up with different sized panels across sections and if you have sections split into 2 or 3 columns having panels of different lengths looks messy.

3) Allow automatic wiki link generation for each vertical section added on a page for example the wiki link to a particular page section would be the page name followed by the section number or page name followed by the first title header of the section. This could even replace the Excerpt so sections could be embedded into other pages conveniently without having to use additional macros and allowing multi-excerpts (each page layout section automatically becomes an excerpt with a unique id).

4) Create option to make entire section clickable with standard wiki link options to other other pages/sections/URLs etc

5) Option to be able Expand and Collapse Sections (also ideally applied to tables, pictures, diagrams and panels).
fields.summary: Page Layout & Sections
Include the "What did you change?" object in the Velocity context so that it can be emailed easily

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31500]. {panel} # Using Source Editor insert the following storage format into a page to test: {noformat}

Therefore I am not able to reproduce in versions more recent than 5.2.5. Tested in both Firefox 25 and Google Chrome 30.0.1599.101 and confirmed.

fields.summary: Comment button and tooltip is incorrect

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31488].
  {panel}

Scenario 1:
1. Create applink to from Confluence to JIRA (2LO should be configured by default)
2. Insert JIM on a confluence page - see that it's rendered correctly
3. Disable the OAuth outgoing authentication from Confluence (Do not untick the "Enable outgoing 2-Legged OAuth requests" option
4. View the JIM again - see that a MacroExecutionException is displayed

Scenario 2:
1. Create applink to from Confluence to JIRA (2LO should be configured by default)
2. Insert JIM on a confluence page - see that it's rendered correctly
3. Disabled "Enable outgoing 2-Legged OAuth requests" from the JIRA incoming OAuth authentication
4. View the JIM again - see that a MacroExecutionException is displayed

Ideally we would display message to the end user indicating that there is an applink misconfiguration
fields.summary: JIRA issues macro throws exceptions when applinks are not configured correctly
